title: How To Be a Calculated Risk-Taker w/ Jeff Dorman

media:group.media:title: How To Be a Calculated Risk-Taker w/ Jeff Dorman
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of My Life in Four Trades, Jeff Dorman, a co-founder, and the chief investment officer of Arca, gets personal with Maggie Lake. 

Jeff explains why he quit traditional finance, shares the lessons he had to learn and unlearn after years of working on Wall Street, and talks about how he’s become a calculated risk-taker. 

After trading at leading TradFi firms such as Lehman Brothers, Merrill Lynch, and Citadel, Jeff moved to Los Angeles for a new blockchain-powered career and to find a work-life balance.
